text: Hi, can you please help me record my blood pressure and heart rate data for today?

output.name: RecordHealthData
output.description: This API records the health history of a patient given user ID, time and health data.

time.description: The time of health data. Format: %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

health_data.description: The health data, with the format like [{'name': 'blood_pressure', 'value': '120/80'}, {'name': 'heart_rate', 'value': '80'}]

text: Alright. I will need your user ID, time, and health data to use this API. Can you please provide me with your user ID and time?
My user ID is 123ABC and the time is 2023-10-15 09:00:00.
Thank you. Now, can you please provide me with your blood pressure and heart rate readings?
My blood pressure is 120/80 and my heart rate is 70 bpm.
Great. I will now call the RecordHealthData API to record this data for you.
Done! Your health data has been recorded successfully.
